titlestmt.titleproper: Commonwealth Fund records, Fellowships, Administration Files, SG 2
A Guide to the Commonwealth Fund records, Fellowships, Administration Files, SG 2 FA1226

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2025-01-01 05:03:14 UTC.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: Commonwealth Fund records, Fellowships, Administration Files, SG 2

physdesc.extent: 127 standard record storage boxes and 3 document boxes.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research with select materials restricted as noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Records remain in order as physically received.
Arranged in four series as follows:
Series 4: International Health Policy Program (IHP) Administration.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Minimal processing. Some records remain in original file folders and record storage boxes.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The Commonwealth Fund archives, along with all subsequent additions to the collection, were donated to Rockefeller Archive Center in 1985. Records were transferred to RAC by Commonwealth Fund in multiple accessions spanning 1988-2001.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Contains administrative records for the Harkness Fellowships, with a limited volume of files pertaining to the Atlantic Fellowships in Public Policy, and the Ian Axford Fellowships in Public Policy.

Files primarily consist of preparatory and planning documentation for associated conferences, workshops, seminars, orientation packets and handbooks. Records also include IHP chronological files and general correspondence as well as general administrative fellows files.
